price: 15. Que non ! ce jour-là, ils seront eux-mêmes privés de la vision de leur Seigneur.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
